item.description:
Since our members wanted to have some "conversational" meetings--where the focus is getting to know one another more deeply, and being able to follow up on threads on interest that emerge as members introduce themselves and their work, our August meeting will provide a chance to do just that!

We will begin with a potluck lunch, and a chance to meet everyone in the group. And the conversation can just naturally unfold and flow from there! This gives us a chance to build a greater sense of community, share resources, network and support one another.

Please let us know what you'll bring to the potluck when you RSVP.

$10 meeting fee.
item.how_to_find_us: I will welcome them at the door
item.name: Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies August Meetup
